text: B'Day Anthology Video Album is a video album, released by the American R&B; singer-songwriter Beyoncé. It was released alongside B'Day Deluxe Edition on April 3, 2007. == Track listing == # Title Director Length 1\. "Beautiful Liar" (duet with Shakira) Jake Nava & Beyoncé 3:34 2\. "Irreplaceable" Anthony Mandler 4:17 3\. "Kitty Kat" (Intro) Melina Matsoukas & Beyoncé 1:03 4\. "Green Light" Melina Matsoukas 3:31 5\. "Upgrade U" (featuring Jay-Z) Melina Matsoukas & Beyoncé 4:38 6\. "Flaws & All" Cliff Watts & Beyoncé 4:14 7\. "Get Me Bodied" (Extended Mix) Anthony Mandler & Beyoncé 6:42 8\. "Freakum Dress" Ray Kay & Beyoncé 3:21 9\. "Suga Mama" Melina Matsoukas & Beyoncé 3:37 10\. "Déjà vu" (featuring Jay-Z) Sophie Muller 4:06 11\. "Ring the Alarm" Sophie Muller 3:33 12\. "Listen" (Director's cut) Diane Martel 3:49 13\. Credits N/A 0:51 Anthology Behind the Scenes/Credits Ed Burke 17:39 Category:2007 albums Category:Beyoncé albums Category:Video albums
title: B'Day Anthology Video Album
